___wageGroupCode.description: Unique wage group which is combination of effective date of the wage.

___isGroup.description: Defines if the current occupation contains sub occupations

items.description: List of modifications of the current wage determination.

___counties.description: Names of counties in which wage determination applicable

___constructionTypes.description: Names of constructions on which wage determination applied

___state.description: State in which wages are applied

___wageDeterminationCode.description: Defines code which is combination of effective year and State code
